Articles.Content:
Hey KSP Community,

While building my space station that I modeled mainly after the ISS, I ran into the problem of not having or finding any solar panels big enough to attach to the end of the station. (Stock ones and the ones in the US Soviet solar panel pack aren't near anything to this scale)Can anyone make solar panels like the one above (orange ones) or refer me to a place to find them? Much appreciated. (Sorry about the large image)

KSO has them but it a good size mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68429-0-90-Kerbin-Shuttle-Orbiter-System-v4-13 And NearFutureSolar http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-1-02-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFSolar-NFSpacecraft-NFConstruction-hotfixed%29 has some big blue ones and KOSMOS http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99168-KOSMOS-3-14-2015-RD-170-Family-Released!

EDIT- The KSO is the only ones that color, I have seen.
NearFutureSolar looks like it has a good one. Do you know if KSO and KOSMOS work with 1.0.2? KSO doesn't seem to have a version for anything beyond .90 and KOSMOS looks like it has nothing beyond .25
KSO should the update is in the back of thread and KOSMOS the panels should work just hear some of the parts need the node fix or run the node cheat.
